column4: This is the most populous distro channel I ever saw in freenode.net, but I net got my question solved here, nobody ever answered my question, not like gentoo channel, people in this channel are just ....
if noone answeres, either they dont know, or your not asking effectively
your question is a hard one, and you provided no details such as video card, or evidence of what you have tried so far.. since doing this is documented on the web
